levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], deal +20% more damage
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every 2 [HardenedBlood] on self (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Consume up to 20 [BloodDinner] and gain 1 [HardenedBlood] for every 10 [BloodDinner] this unit consumed
- If this unit failed to consume [BloodDinner], gain 15 [Laceration]
levelList.name: Just a Taste Please!

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Consume up to 30 [BloodDinner]; gain 1 [HardenedBlood] and heal 5 SP for every 10 [BloodDinner] consumed
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 2 [HardenedBlood] on self (Max 2)
levelList.name: Textile Cut

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Spend 2 [HardenedBlood] to inflict 1 [BloodScissorScars] next turn (Max once per turn)

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If the target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every 2 [HardenedBlood] on self (Max 2)
[WhenUse] Deal +5% damage for every 1 [HardenedBlood] on self (Max 25%)
[EndSkill] If the target is killed, increase [BloodDinner] by 30 and gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn.
levelList.name: Don't Rush Me!

coindescs.desc: Consume up to 5 [HardenedBlood] to increase damage dealt by 15% for every [HardenedBlood] spent
